sentences.sentence: He has recently been diagnosed with angina.
sentences.translation: 他最近被诊断出患有心绞痛。

sentences.sentence: The group adopted the simpler, more descriptive title of Angina Support Group.
sentences.translation: 该组织采用了更简单、更具描述性的名称——心绞痛支持组织。

sentences.sentence: Other signs of angina are nausea, sweating, feeling faint and shortness of breath.
sentences.translation: 心绞痛的其他征兆是恶心、出汗、感觉虚弱晕眩和气短。
